page.title: 13TRADE - SHOPPING
page.content: Loddiswell is the only one of the three settlements to have any shops, and it is, for its size, very well "shopped":- Elliot's - foodstore plus bakery also selling meats and wines. London House Stores - foodstore plus newsagents. Post Office Stores - fancy goods, books, clothing, cards, gifts and sweets. Pet and Garden - plants, garden sundries, pet foods, some electrical. Strands Ladies and Gents Hairdressers Jeffery's Garage and Filling Station. Two inns. Thus Loddiswell is extremely self- sufficient for everyday shopping needs. Many people however go to Kingsbridge for their weekly shopping and a number go to the large Tesco store near Ivybridge for easy parking.
